description:
An introduction to the English-language literatures of North America and the Caribbean from the late 16th to the early 19th centuries. Works in various genres by Thomas Hariot, John Smith, William Bradfor, Mary Rowlandson, Anne Bradstreet, Jonathan Edwards, Sarah Knight, Franklin, Jefferson, Wheatley, Freneau, Bryant, Poe, and many others. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: EARLY AMERICAN LIT
